title: Mafia Jinx voice-over disappears
body: Whenever i play Jinx with the Mafia skin selected the entire voice-over just disappears even the line she is supposed to say when she fires her "Zap", sometimes when I kill a champion or kill someone with my Zap Jinx says one line but then it completly disappears again. {{champion:222}}

replies.body: Just noticed this myself in a bot game. The first time I've used the skin in a while so I'm glad it's being worked on and not just my imagination.

Hey Dαmiαn Wαyne,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
